extendedInfo.description: "Army & Maiden" is a real time war simulation game. Small units automatically battle in a display. You can move a unit or some units. One game is a very short time. You can clear a stage in about 1-5 minutes. "Clear Time" and "Score" are recorded. You must aim at the high score! (This game is a sequel to [Army & Maiden S1F].)(You can play this game stand alone.)** If you find some bugs, please send an E-mail. I will ask details, and I fix application bugs.** When you post your comment to the Android Market, I do not understand details. Therefore, it is difficult for me to correspond. Please continue your favors toward cooperation.** You can send your e-mail from this page's footer. (webmaster@crocro.com)We developed the PC and Android compatible game system. If you visit our web page, you can get a PC version too.

reviews.comment: Awesome! Graphics could use a boost.
reviews.author: A Google User
